name: QuantSelectionAgent
description: QuantSelectionAgent runs the ValueCell Quant Screener (wide scan + deep evidence chain) and explains candidate rationale with evidence-backed logic graphs.

skills.name: Run quant screener
skills.description: Start a wide-to-deep screener run and persist local evidence artifacts.
examples: Run the monthly screener and show the top candidates.
Start a weekly scan focused on underfollowed mid caps.

skills.name: Explain candidate rationale
skills.description: Summarize a candidate's score breakdown and link to its evidence chain.
examples: Explain why NVDA ranked in the top 5.
Show the evidence chain for ASML.
